attributes.action: Keep face masks mandatory in England
attributes.background: Keep face masks mandatory in England to help keep safe vulnerable people, key workers, the nhs, transport, the tourist industry business in general

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions: 

'Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616

'Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694

'Keep requirement to wear a face covering in shops & supermarkets after July 19th': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590829

'Continue to make face masks mandatory in all healthcare settings from 19th July.': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590820
